rules.natural: If the bus is accelerating, then it is moving.
Either the bus is braking or it is running.
Provided that the bus is at a red traffic light, it is not braking.

rules.prover9_expression: (is_running(bus, true) -> (-(-is_operational(bus, true) -> has_passengers(bus, many)) -> is_delayed(bus, true)))
